replies.body: My wallet is safe this week.
Lucky week, I was broke anyway
Thanks for the cheap Malzahar! Also that skin for Skarner looks epic if I had him.

I **REALLY** want illaoi, talon, yorick, camile, and Vi sale - I feel like its been forever
I was really hoping it would be Thresh this week. I have the dark star skin waiting in my loot.
